name: Daddy K's Milk Boiled Corn on the Cob
author: KornDog
summary: Absolutely sweet and tender corn on the cob! Serve with salt, black pepper, and butter.
ingredients: water, or as needed to cover
⅓ cup white sugar, or more to taste
8 ears corn on the cob, husks and silk removed
directions: Bring water to a boil in a large stock pot; stir in milk, sugar, cream, and butter until sugar dissolves and butter melts
Gently place ears of corn into the mixture and reduce heat to low
Simmer corn until tender, 7 to 8 minutes
Remove from the liquid with tongs and set aside under aluminum foil until serving time
